entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 2:46 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: E 40 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
